name: Kabir'sDohe
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: kabir's dohe
des:
Kabir Das ji's couplets are very famous and popular. They contain ageless wisdom and are still very relevant.
It is our endeavour to ensure that they are not lost in today's hectic lifestyle. 
So, here we present to you "kabir's dohe" to cherish the memories and share the wisdom. Just enable the skill by saying - "Alexa, enable Kabir's Dohe".
Once enabled, just say "Alexa, open kabir's dohe" and that's it, you can then immerse yourself in the world of Kabir Das ji's couplets/dohas.
You can listen to the couplet originally as written in Hindi and then its meaning in Hindi or English, depending on your language setting.
We hope you enjoy this unique skill, please do not forget to rate us if you like it.

Now, you can also enjoy the immense knowledge which is part of Goswami Tulsidasji's dohas (couplets). Just enable "Tulsi Dohavali" and soak in the timeless wisdom which is inherent in these couplets.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
